item.title: Hrvoje Misetic
item.description: Hrvoje obtained his Bachelor’s and Master’s degree in Molecular Biology from the University of Zagreb. At the CRG-Centre for Genomic Regulation in Barcelona, he conducted his master thesis internship where he worked on the evolution of peroxisomes. He started his PhD in September, 2019 as a Marie Sklodowska-Curie fellow as part of the Computational Oncology TRaining (CONTRA) innovative training network at the Francis Crick Institute with Professor Francesca Ciccarelli.
